name: FIXED! Dark mode for proboards.com
description:
It's all dark and good. Also removed some bright images made, re-enable them in Style Settings if the brightness doesn't matter for you.

https://login.proboards.com/login/6950995/1

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here. Used to post a lot of styles before the pandemic.

I also use userstyles.world, an improved version of this website: https://userstyles.world/user/frostynick

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info:
The release was a mess because most of the theme didn't even exist. That is now fixed.

Working on:

- Kinda rushed, I'll try to improve the overall theme.
